title: Designing LLM Utilization Strategies for Data Science Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening competencies in utilizing Large Language Models (LLMs) to solve real-world business problems

learning_goals: They can assess LLM code-generation capabilities in real-world data science tasks and select optimal prompt strategies (FSP/ToT).
They can improve the performance (accuracy, F1 score, RMSE) of LLM-based solutions by over 15% by applying hyperparameter tuning (HPT) techniques.
They can compare the validity of LLM recommendation algorithm selections through Kaggle-based case analyses and evaluate efficiency relative to AutoML tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
